data.title: MBBS Admission Orenburg State Medical University Russia Fee
data.meta_description: Orenburg State Medical University is one of the best place in Russia. If you plan MBBS Admission orenburg state medical university in Russia fee structure 2023.
data.text:
Orenburg State Medical University Russia

Well Wisher Education specialises in Guidance, Counseling, and Admission to Orenburg State Medical University. It’s a little difficult for students and parents to decide on studying MBBS abroad as they are unaware of the many benefits associated with it. We at Well Wisher act as a common communication bridge between students, parents, and medical universities in Russia to make life much easier for all.

Orenburg State Medical University Russia offer practical knowledge and hands-on experience in real-time or better to say real-life medical situation.

Why Orenburg State Medical University Russia?

Quality education.

Affordability in terms of cost of study and living.

Why Us Orenburg State Medical University Russia?

We hold an excellent track record of providing counselling and guidance to lakhs of aspiring MBBS students. Our team of MBBS admission consultants offers

Personal as well as professional counseling.

Offer guidance on the visa process explaining pre-departure to post-arrival formalities.

Impart detailed understanding of Orenburg State Medical University Russia fee structure.

Expedite assistance on knowing the primary constituents connected with living and learning in Russia.

Guarantee timely admission.

Orenburg State Medical University Russia was established in 1944. Orenburg State Medical University is one of the oldest and finest higher educational institutions in Russia. The first batch of doctors graduated from Orenburg State Medical University in May 1950.The Orenburg State Medical University is in Orenburg City, Russia, which is located around 1300 kilometres from Moscow.

Orenburg State Medical University is one of the best universities in Russia. In the year 2018, Forbes magazine published the first rating of the best universities in Russia. The rating criteria of the top 100 best universities in Russia were on the basis of the standard of education, the quality of graduated professionals and the Forbes factor. Based on the results of the ranking of the top 100, the Orenburg State Medical University succeeded in securing the 61st position. And among nine Russian medical universities, Orenburg State Medical University is ranked 4th.

Orenburg State Medical University faculty provide its students with world-class facilities and modern medical education with up-to-date medical innovations and research, which results in the high quality of education, especially in the field of general medicine. The faculty of Orenburg State Medical University is very learned and experienced and provides world-class medical education to the students.

And almost 250 medical professionals pass out every year from the Orenburg State Medical University who work and contribute to the medical field all across the globe. The degree obtained from Orenburg State Medical University is highly valued across the world. MBBS fees at Orenburg State Medical University are very low and affordable. Every year in April, Orenburg State Medical University opens its doors for MBBS admission.

Faculty Russia

Faculty of Obstetrics and Gynecology

Faculty of Human Anatomy

Faculty of Human Anatomy

Faculty of Surgery Department, Urology

Faculty of Obstetrics and Gynecology

Faculty of Medicine

Faculty of Human Anatomy

Faculty of Surgery Department, Urology

Faculty of Children’s Diseases

Faculty of General Surgery

Faculty of Surgery and Clinical Anatomy

Faculty of Internal Medicine

Faculty of Traumatology and Orthopedics

Faculty of Endocrinology

Documents Required for MBBS Admission in Russian

Scanned copy of the filled admission form

Scanned copy of mark sheet and certificate of class 10th

Scanned copy of passing mark sheet and certificate of class 12th

6 Passport size colored photographs

Scanned copy of passport (first and last page)

HIV test report

NEET score card

MBBS Fee Structure : ORENBURG STATE MEDICAL UNIVERSITY RUSSIA

1 USD = 65 rupees (Subject to change as per exchange rates)

If you are also looking out or exploring the various avenues of getting admission to MBBS and want to experience the advantage of taking medicinal education in Russia, then come and speak to our specialist and proficient admission consultants.

Accommodations for Orenburg State Medical University Russia

Orenburg State Medical University has 3 hostels. They were opened in 1961, 1964, and 1981, correspondingly. The hostels are very good and hygienic. Rooms in the hostels are fully furnished and provide a quiet study environment.

Orenburg State Medical University hostels have become second homes for all students who come from different places. The hostel is wifi enabled, so all the students can avail the benefit of free internet. The hostel of Orenburg State Medical University has almost all the modern facilities that are required for comfortable living. It also has the facility of an Indian mess where healthy and nutritious food is provided to the Indian students.
